div.p: Rhizosphere is an innovative project to provide in-browser html-based spatial navigation and interaction on structured data. It is a data visualization tool: it lets you visualize, browse, filter and act upon datasets of your choice. Rhizosphere is available both as as javascript library and as a Google Web Toolkit module.
This site demonstrates how to use the Rhizosphere library within a Google Web Toolkit application. Use the tabs above to navigate between different examples of GWT integration.
Rhizosphere is open source code, released under the terms of the Apache License, version 2.0.
